entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: madam bones
entities.description: Madam Bones is a great witch who has passed away, as mentioned by Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, known for his wisdom and kindness.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are a group of dark wizards and witches who follow Lord Voldemort.

relationships.description: Harry knows Dumbledore as his headmaster at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
Dumbledore knew Madam Bones, who was a great witch.
Harry is targeted by the Death Eaters due to his connection with Dumbledore and the wizarding world.
Dumbledore is also targeted by the Death Eaters, as mentioned in the Ministry of Magic leaflet.
